description: Surrounded by vibrant communities from Arcoris SoHo, Arcoris Residences and Arcoris Business Suites, Arcoris Plaza provides retailers with access to a diverse market. Its discerning shoppers are comprised of local and international residents, creating a melting pot of cultures. The Arcoris development is connected to the Kuala Lumpur City Centre and surrounding suburbs by the SRPINT, NKVE and DUKE highways.
